tool.name: In-Silico Labeling - Standardization
tool.description: This script is to standardize pixel values in images such that bright field images have mean of 0.5 and florescent channel images mean of 0.25 and both have standard deviation of 0.125.

param.name: output_path
param.label: Specify path for the output, where the flat field corrected images will be saved.

param.name: channels
param.label: Specify channels to flat field correct.

tool.help: This interface sends Unix commands to run In-Silico Labeling Standardization before prediction or training.
